Question.Subject: Has anyone sold a domain name on the Internet?
Question.Content: Has anyone sold a domain name on the internet? Which auction service did you use and how did you know how to put a price on it? Any tips would be great! Thanks :)
Question.ChosenAnswer:
I buy and sell domains all the time. I estimate the prices my self. I could estimate for you if you wish. Message me your list. I dont use any auctions but i post my domains for sale on my DOMAIN BLOG at http://capocorporation.com/domainblog/ if you wish i could give you a user name for this blog so you could add your domains here. this way you and I see our domains seen by more people..
If interested message me.
Good luck!

Answer.Content:
I buy and sell domains all the time. I estimate the prices my self. I could estimate for you if you wish. Message me your list. I dont use any auctions but i post my domains for sale on my DOMAIN BLOG at http://capocorporation.com/domainblog/ if you wish i could give you a user name for this blog so you could add your domains here. this way you and I see our domains seen by more people..
If interested message me.
Good luck!
